item.description:
Hey Folks,

Please join us at the Democracy Center for an open rehearsal! After our regular repertoire of warmups, we will practice a few drills that will further develop our storytelling skills. Following that, we will learn a few games that emphasize storytelling, and incorporate the other skills we've practiced. At the outset, though, we'll briefly talk a bit about how we can raise funds to support the organizations goals. Come out for an afternoon of fun!

See you,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal
